Sorry I haven't said anything in the past day or so, I got suddenly crushed
with responsibilities that I have to take care of which leaves me almost no
posting time :(

Please give me a day or two more to dig out, and then i will throw out some
responses from my characters :)

Again, my apologies

Preston
